synopsis.text: Shuwawan! offers a heartwarming glimpse into the Saitou family's delightful daily life. At the center are photographer Harumichi and his wife Manami, a deaf couple who lovingly raise their two hearing children - energetic 3-year-old Itsuki and curious baby Hotori. Though the family faces communication barriers, their home resounds with laughter and fun. Harumichi captures their special moments through his popular manga diary works. With humor and wisdom, Shuwawan! explores the singular joys and chaotic comedy of this family's world. Told in brief 5-minute episodes, it gives viewers a chance to connect with a family whose story is little-seen, yet instantly familiar. Their inspiring ability to bridge sound and silence speaks to the inclusive bonds at the heart of all families.
